articles.description: For the second race in succession, rain played a major role in how things played out in Japan on Sunday. Unlike Singapore, however, this Grand Prix ended with Max Verstappen crowned champion for a second time.

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Dhawan's ‘thanks Maharaj’ remark after India's win leaves everyone in splits - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shreyas Iyer and Ishan Kishan turned the game around for India as the chase was wrapped up with 4.1 overs to spare. But for Dhawan, he rather credited South Africa's stand-in skipper Keshav Maharaj for the win. | Cricket
articles.content: It was a clinical win from the second-strong Indian side as they bounced back in the three-match series to level it at 1-1 following an impressive seven-wicket win in Ranchi against South Africa. 278… [+1911 chars]
